triples.name: Language model
triples.relevance: TimeLMs are specialized language models, building on the foundational concept of language modeling.

triples.name: Twitter
triples.relevance: The paper trains models specifically on diachronic Twitter data as its primary dataset.

triples.name: Diachrony and synchrony
triples.relevance: The paper introduces diachronic language models, applying temporal/historical linguistic analysis to modern language modeling.

triples.name: Incremental learning
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a continual learning strategy to update models incrementally over time.

triples.name: Named-entity recognition
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes how models handle trends involving specific named entities in temporal Twitter data.

triples.name: Concept drift
triples.relevance: The paper qualitatively analyzes concept drift as a key phenomenon in temporal Twitter language modeling.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: NLP is the broader field in which language models and the present work are situated.
